（一）辦理資源教室身心障礙學生輔導與行政業務。
（二）教育部大專校院推動身心障礙學生職涯輔導計畫執行與結案。

二、應徵條件
（一）具備教育部認可之國內外大學心理與諮商輔導、特殊教育、教育心理、社會工作、社會…等相關學士學歷或以上學歷。
（二）具大專院校身心障礙學生輔導或機構輔導實務與行政工作經驗者為佳。
（三）有大專院校學生輔導實務經驗以及職涯就業輔導經驗者優先考慮。

五、工作時間：聘期依計畫案為主，可即日上班，上班時間依學校規定。

六、應徵方式：
(一)意者請備妥：履歷表（附近照乙張）、自傳、成績單、最高學歷證件影本、工作經驗證明及對工作期許。
(二)資料寄至「236新北市土城市青雲路380巷1號 宏國德霖科技大學-人事室收」，信封上請註明「應徵資源教室-專業輔導老師」。來函務必註明聯絡電話或手機號碼，合則通知面試，不合者恕不退件及函覆。

七、聯絡人員及方式：
陳先生

cust_name: 富智捷股份有限公司
job_detail:
Responsibilities:
•           Guides and coaches the Scrum Team on how to use Agile practices and principles to deliver high quality products and services to our customers.
•           Gets team to a high performing level by recognizing areas of strength and improvement and employing appropriate coaching and development techniques.
•           Responsible for ensuring Scrum is understood and the team adheres to Scrum theory, practice, and guidelines.
•           Coaches the Scrum team in self-organization, cross-functional skillset, domain knowledge and communicates effectively, both internally and externally working within the Scrum team.
•           Works with Scrum Team, as well as internal and external stakeholders, to influence and drive decision making and support organizational project or product teams.
•           Resolves team impediments with other Scrum Masters to increase the effectiveness of the application of Scrum in the organization.
•           Works with Agile coaches and other Scrum Masters to grow within the role.
•           Contributes to the advancement and improvement of Agile practices within the organization.
•           Facilitates and supports all scrum events: Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, and Sprint Retrospective.
 
Qualifications / Skills:
•           Exemplifies and promotes Agile values and principles
•           Working knowledge and experience with several Agile methodologies SCRUM, XP, Kanban, SAFe and fluid or understanding of software development life cycle models as well as in-depth knowledge of traditional project management principles and practices
•           Adept at refinement, story splitting, estimation, velocity, retrospection, and other Scrum techniques
•           Planning and problem solving with product management and delivery teams
•           Excellent communication skills for both business and technology scenarios in English and Mandarin (both oral and written)
•           Working knowledge of technical engineering best practices including test driven development, continuous integration, DevOps is a plus
 
Education and Experience:
•           Bachelor’s degree and 4 years of product or project development experience, or 3 years of project development experience on an Agile Team or an equivalent combination of education and work experience
•           Strong experience on driving agile transformations from design to implementation
•           Demonstrated experience facilitating meetings at multiple levels of an organization and an understanding of facilitation techniques

cust_name: 富智捷股份有限公司
job_detail:
MobileDrive is mainly engaged in the research, development and sales of proactive services and cutting-edge AI algorithms with auto-driving, in-vehicle electronics, and infotainment systems. This position is responsible for the development of critical “perception” and “prediction” modules using deep learning, computer vision, and multi-sensor fusion, which are technical cores for autonomous driving (in Level 2 to Level 3). 

1. Develop the core deep learning based algorithms. 
2. Optimize the algorithm / model on autonomous driving platforms. 
3. Emphasizing on perception and prediction modules.
major: 資訊工程相關
skill: 軟體程式設計, Machine Learning
other:
Required Skills: 
1. Having prior knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning and deep learning. 
2. Familiarity with deep learning theory and common development frameworks, e.g., Tensorflow, PyTorch, Caffe. 
3. Familiarity with at least one of the programming languages: C, C++, Python. 
 
Preferred Qualifications: 
1. Familiarity with at least one of the core technologies: perception and prediction for autonomous driving, computer vision, robotics vision, sensor fusion, SLAM, and having research ability or project experience. 
2. Having development experiences with professional toolkits, e.g., OpenCV, OpenVX. 
3. Familiarity with development environments, e.g., Linux, Android Automotive, QNX.

The MobileDrive AI team focuses on developing state-of-the-art deep learning technologies to enable future automotive solutions such as advanced assisted driving, smart cockpit, AR navigation, autonomous driving, etc.

There are more and more platforms supporting deep learning frameworks. How to optimize deep learning models on each platform is a very important part of commercialization. This position focuses on porting and deploying the algorithms and deep models to automotive platforms or mobile devices. 

1. Realize deep learning models in edge devices. 
2. Application logic implementation.
3. Optimization on target device.
4. Support developments of automotive products.
major: 資訊工程相關
other:
Required Skills: 
1. Familiarity with C, C++, Java. 
2. Familiarity with OS, data structure and algorithm. 
3. Familiarity with Android Apps. 
4. Familiarity with Linux. 
 
Preferred Qualifications: 
1. Familiarity with Python. 
2. Familiarity with deep learning theory and common development frameworks, e.g., Tensorflow, PyTorch, Caffe, Keras. 
3. Familiarity with OpenCV API. 
4. Familiarity with Makefile, CMake syntax. 
5. Familiarity with all kinds of application platforms, e.g., Nvidia, QualComm, MTK, TI, Renesas. 
6. Familiarity with optimization techniques across computing units, e.g., CPU, GPU, NPU, DSP.

job_name: Computer Vision and Machine Learning Engineer 演算法工程師
cust_name: 富智捷股份有限公司
job_detail:
MobileDrive is the first Taiwan-based automotive company dedicated to AI and software solutions. The MobileDrive AI team focuses on developing state-of-the-art deep learning technologies to enable future automotive solutions such as advanced assisted driving, smart cockpit, AR navigation, autonomous driving, etc.

Computer vision and sensing are the core technology for popular applications such as autonomous driving, SLAM and smart cockpit. This position is responsible for the development of the core algorithms for vision and sensing using computer vision, environment sensing, machine learning and computational photography, which are core applications for automotive products and all kinds of end devices. 

1. Develop the core algorithm. 
2. Optimize the algorithm / model for target commercial platforms. 
3. Support developments of autonomous driving.
major: 資訊工程相關
other:
Required Skills: 
1. Having prior knowledge of Computer Science and Information Engineering fields. 
2. Familiarity with at least one of the programming languages: C, C++, Java, Python. 
3. Familiarity with at least one core technology: computer vision, machine learning, 3D vision, computer graphics, computational photography, sensing, and having research ability or project experience. 
 
Preferred Qualifications: 
1. Familiarity with deep learning theory and common development frameworks, e.g., Tensorflow, PyTorch, Caffe. 
2. Having development experiences with professional toolkits, e.g., OpenCV, OpenCL, OpenGL. 
3. Familiarity with development environments, e.g., Windows, Linux, Android, Android Automotive, QNX. 
4. Familiarity with AR / VR / MR core technologies and applications.

Our long-term goal is to build the best global AI team and deliver state-of-the-art solutions in autonomous perception, prediction, and human understanding.
If you are interested, please contact us, we look forward to your joining!

MobileDrive is mainly engaged in the research, development and sales of proactive services and cutting-edge AI algorithms with auto-driving, in-vehicle electronics, and infotainment systems. This position is responsible for leading teams to develop functions for vehicle use. 

1. Leading the development of the core deep learning based algorithms. 
2. Planning the right direction for development on the target platform.
3. Good communication for working with other teams.
major: 資訊工程相關
other:
Master’s degree or above in Computer Science and Information Engineering
* Bonus points for doctorate

Required Skills: 
1. More than 5 years' work experience or 3 years' work experience with PhD degree.
2. Having prior knowledge of Computer Science and Information Engineering fields. 
3. Familiarity with deep learning theory and common development frameworks.
4. Familiarity with at least one core technology: computer vision, machine learning, 3D vision, computer graphics, computational photography, sensing, and having research ability or project experience. 
 
Preferred Qualifications: 
1. Having experiences on automotive.
2. Having development experiences with professional toolkits, e.g., OpenCV, OpenCL, OpenGL. 
3. Familiarity with development environments, e.g., Windows, Linux, Android, Android Automotive, QNX. 
4. Familiarity with AR / VR / MR core technologies and applications.
5. Familiarity with at least one of the programming languages: C, C++, Java, Python.

job_name: ADAS系統模擬與整車調校工程師
cust_name: 富智捷股份有限公司
job_detail:
MobileDrive ADAS team has full experiences in automotive control and functional safety. We are currently the only Taiwan-based company that can provide full-set and industry-level verification and validation (V&V) processes compliant with international standards such as EURO-NCAP, China-NCAP, etc. 

依循ISO26262功能安全標準，ADAS驗證須從感知器性能測試，到系統模擬驗證，與整車主客觀駕駛性調校，再進行開放道路里程累積。

1. 車輛、感知器、道路環境、交通場景等模型建模分析及測試用例建立。
2. ADAS模擬平台搭建調適及功能模擬驗證及分析。
3. 感知器評測方式建立及KPI數據分析。
4. ADAS系統主客觀駕駛性調校與系統測試分析。
5. ADAS實用場域驗證手法建立及數據分析。

cust_name: 大揚電裝股份有限公司
job_detail:
1. 檢查、測試、或測量材料、產品、裝置，使之符合規格。
2. 使用測量儀器（如：尺規或測微器等）測量產品的尺寸以符合規格。
3. 分析及解釋藍圖、數據、手冊和其他材料，以確定規格、檢驗程序、測試程序、調整方法、檢定方法等。
4. 收集或挑選樣本，以進行測試或作為模型使用。
5. 分析、計算測驗數據，以確認測試結果。
6. 與負責產品的人員討論檢查的結果，並建議必要的修正行動。
7. 丟棄或排除不符合規格的產品、材料和設備。
8. 標記產品檢驗的結果，如等級、接受或拒絕狀態。
9. 根據尺寸、重量、顏色或其他規格將產品分類和分級。
major: 電機電子工程相關

cust_name: 台灣康寧顯示玻璃股份有限公司
job_detail:
Scope of Position:
The Molding Engineering Supervisor is responsible for directing, coaching, and mentoring a group of mold development engineers within Mold Engineering team. This leadership position will manage mold engineering talent supporting associated product teams, corporate business directives and production objectives.  This position is a working supervisor position with both management responsibility for mold design and project engineers and running projects as required with the focus inside the Taiwan facility, global activity is possible.  

Major Roles and Responsibilities:
• Direct Mold Design Engineers and Project Engineers activity in support of mold fabrication and improvement projects. Conduct annual PD&R with each individual direct report
• Run improvement projects and work closely with the Taipei mold fabrication team
• Support deployment of new process technologies and improvement of operational methods within the mold fabrication facility that reduce manufacturing cost, increase efficiency, and improves capability.  Identify and drive improvement opportunities in the Taipei mold fabrication facility
• Collaborate with project leaders and manage MDE Taiwan DE team to support project timeline and fabrication schedule.  Communicate mold project status back to MDE project managers and team
• Ensure the documentation and standard practices are valued, maintained, and practiced in the fabrication of injection molds.   Work to improve documentation and standard practices as a MDE organization
• Support the mold fabrication team in the Corning Taipei facility with modeling and mold design

Skill and Knowledge Requirements:
[Experience Requirements]
• 4 years minimum in engineering role
• 1 years minimum managing engineering or technical team

[Required Skills] 
• Knowledge of injection molding (process or fabrication)
• Strong communication skill and comfortable presenting information
• Excellent project management skills
• Excellent problem solving and decision-making skills demonstrated using advanced data analysis

cust_name: 富智康國際股份有限公司(鴻海集團)
job_detail:
Artificial intelligence technology requires large amounts of data as the basis of machine learning, either for training or visualization. This position focuses on large amounts of data collection, data cleaning, data labeling, data augmentation and data synthesis for deep learning models, and for applications in automotive and various end-device products. 

1.	Collect and clean large amounts of data, create corresponding dataset required for core intelligent algorithms. 
2.	Perform data analysis, data visualization, and proof of concept for algorithms. 
3.	Auto-labeling mechanism and manual correction system.
4.	Support developments of automotive products.
other:
Required Skills: 
1.Familiarity and having relevant research or development experiences with at least one of the core technologies: image processing, computer vision, machine learning, computational photography.
2.Having prior knowledge of Computer Science and Information Engineering fields. 
3.Familiarity with at least one of the programming languages: C, C++, Python. 
4.Familiarity with SQL syntax and database principles.  
5.Familiarity with data structure, data mining, and having relevant practical experiences with data collection and analysis. 
 
Preferred Qualifications: 
1.Familiarity with deep learning theory and common development frameworks, e.g., Tensorflow, PyTorch, Caffe. 
2.Familiarity with various data augmentation and data synthesis technologies. 
3.Having development experiences with professional toolkits, e.g., OpenCV, OpenCL, OpenGL.

job_name: 數據科學家Data Scientist (Data Science & AI Team)
cust_name: 鴻海精密工業股份有限公司
job_detail:
<About the job>：
The Data Science & AI team of headquarter IT is developing the frontier and practical analytic technologies that enhance the data value. As the data scientist, you'll join the AI/Big Data Analytics program/projects related to management topics, including Commercial/Industrial Engineering/Supply Chain/Financial Performance/Operation...etc., to build the model or algorithm to empower data-driven & analytics-driven for driving business value from data insights in this world-class company (Fortune Global 500, 22nd).


<Job Description>： 
．Design, implement and refine advanced Statistical Modeling/Machine Learning/Deep Learning/Numerical Simulation/Optimization Algorithm Models(at least one of the fields)
．Ensure alignment of modeling initiatives with the requirement goal defined by key stakeholders and company objectives and identify new hypotheses for model improvements. 
．Executing big data analysis and predictive analytics projects include feature engineering, model building, algorithm development, etc. 
．Works closely with a team of data system analysts, business data analysts, data engineers, data platform architects, etc. 
．Collaborate effectively with team members, whether leading tasks or supporting initiatives led by others.
．Self-motivated, Result-oriented, and interested in applying quantitative methods to solving business and engineering problems.

<Skills>
．Experience with any one of Machine Learning, Statistical Modeling, Deep Learning(Nature Language/Image), Econometric Modeling, Optimization Algorithm(OR), Numerical Simulation..., etc., model/algorithm building of the practical application in the industry.
．Familiarity with programming languages like Python or R, or Java. (Good programming skills in Python is a plus). 
．Advanced ability to perform Exploratory Data Analysis and working knowledge of statistics. 
．Ability to visualize data in the most effective way possible for a given task, especially visualize models and results and debug and troubleshoot code and models.
．Big on finding the many insights based on the data and being passionate and patient about working with complex data.
major: 資訊管理相關 資訊工程相關 數理統計相關
other:
<Preferred Qualifications>:
．Ph.D. degree/Ph.D. Candidate would be preferred.
．(Plus)Knowledge of Big Data with Machine Learning/Statistical modeling related technologies such as Spark MLlib or pySpark or SparkR/SparklyR.
．(Plus)Knowledge of Deep Learning Framework such as TensorFlow/Caffe/Pytorch/Keras. 
．(Plus)Experience in graph neural network or related fields

．2 years+ of industry experience in data science focusing on one of the areas :
(1)	Statistical modeling, Machine learning
(2)	Graph Analytics and Graph Algorithm(Graph Theory), especially Graph Neural Network(GNN), Graph Convolutional Network(GCN
(3)	Deep Learning(NLP/Text Mining, Image)
(4)	Optimization Algorithm
(5)	Numerical Simulation, Econometric Modeling
(6)	Other Quantitative Forecasting Methods


<Minimum Qualifications>： 
．2+ years of professional experience with a degree of Ph.D. /Ph.D. Candidate or 4+ years of relevant working experience with a degree of Master
．Major in Computer Science/Information Engineering/Information Management/Statistic/Applied Mathematics or related quantitative discipline (such as in a field where there is intensive training in quantitative methods, e.g.,  Statistics, Machine Learning, Electrical, and Computer Engineering, Economics, Physics, Industrial Engineering, Operation Research).

job_name: 數據科學家(統計) Data Scientist(Statistician) (Data Science & AI Team)
cust_name: 鴻海精密工業股份有限公司
job_detail:
<About the job>：
The Data Science & AI team of headquarter IT is developing the frontier and practical analytic technologies that enhance the data value. As the data scientist, you'll join the AI/Big Data Analytics program/projects related to management topics, including Commercial/Industrial Engineering/Supply Chain/Financial Performance/Operation...etc., to build the model or algorithm to empower data-driven & analytics-driven for driving business value from data insights in this world-class company (Fortune Global 500, 22nd).

<Job Description>：
•Design, implement and refine advanced Statistical Modeling/Algorithm Models
•Ensure alignment of modeling initiatives with the requirement goal defined by key stakeholders and company objectives and identify new hypotheses for model improvements.
•Executing big data analysis and predictive analytics projects include feature engineering, model building, algorithm development, etc.
•Collaborate effectively with team members, whether leading tasks or supporting initiatives led by others.
•Self-motivated, Result-oriented, and interested in applying quantitative methods to solving business and engineering problems.
•Able to use the cutting-edge technologies to solve the practical problems

<Skills>
•Experience with any one of Machine Learning, Statistical Modeling, Deep Learning, Econometric Modeling, Optimization Algorithm(OR), Numerical Simulation..., etc., model/algorithm building of the practical application in the industry.
•Familiarity with programming languages like Python or R, or Java. (Good programming skills in Python is a plus).
•Advanced ability to perform Exploratory Data Analysis and working knowledge of statistics.
•Ability to visualize data in the most effective way possible for a given task, especially visualize models and results and debug and troubleshoot code and models.
•Experience in setting up supervised & unsupervised learning models including data cleaning, data analytics, feature creation, model selection, performance metrics & visualization

•(Plus)Knowledge of Big Data with Machine Learning/Statistical modeling related technologies such as Spark MLlib or pySpark or SparkR/SparklyR.
•(Plus)Knowledge of Deep Learning Framework such as TensorFlow/Caffe/Pytorch/Keras.
•(Plus)Ph.D. degree/Ph.D. Candidate would be preferred.

job_name: Server 系統整合測試工程師
cust_name: 鴻海精密工業股份有限公司
job_detail:
1.工程師職缺:
   a. 負責x86-64伺服器操作測試，涵蓋的有: 測試與驗證系統功能(functional test)、相容性(options compatibility test)、效能(performance)、壓力承載(stress loading)、可靠度(RAS feature test)以及整合測試BIOS、BMC、與伺服器硬體所有配件
   b. 對發現的產品Defect能有初步的分析與Isolation test去收斂問題點

2. 有Intel and AMD x86或ARM伺服器或x86 storage server, networking switch等硬體類產品經驗者尤佳
3. 有伺服器當中主機板的研發與測試過程，具備問題診斷偵錯能力且對Defect敏感經驗者尤佳
*畢業新生擁有電腦硬體裝修軟體應用證照亦可，1年以上電腦系統整合測試工程師經驗尤佳

cust_name: 富智康國際股份有限公司(鴻海集團)
job_detail:
Our team is mainly engaged in the research, development and sales of proactive services and cutting-edge AI algorithms with auto-driving, in-vehicle electronics, and infotainment systems. This position is responsible for the development of critical “perception” and “prediction” modules using deep learning, computer vision, and multi-sensor fusion, which are technical cores for autonomous driving (in Level 2 to Level 3). 

1.	Develop the core deep learning based algorithms. 
2.	Optimize the algorithm / model on autonomous driving platforms. 
3.	Emphasizing on perception and prediction modules.
other:

1.Having prior knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning and deep learning. 
2.Familiarity with deep learning theory and common development frameworks, e.g., Tensorflow, PyTorch, Caffe. 
3.Familiarity with at least one of the programming languages: C, C++, Python. 
 
Preferred Qualifications: 
1.Familiarity with at least one of the core technologies: perception and prediction for autonomous driving, computer vision, robotics vision, sensor fusion, SLAM, and having research ability or project experience. 
2.Having development experiences with professional toolkits, e.g., OpenCV, OpenVX. 
3.Familiarity with development environments, e.g., Linux, Android Automotive, QNX.

cust_name: 鴻海精密工業股份有限公司
job_detail:
<About the job>：
As the data business analyst, you'll join the Data & Analytics Technology team and participate in the AI/Big Data Analytics program/projects related to management topics, including Commercial/Industrial Engineering/Supply Chain/Financial Performance/Operation...etc., to assistant business process analysis and outlining problems, gather and analyze information and bridging the gap between data scientist/data engineers and the business to assess requirements.  

<Job Description>：
1. Evaluate, analyze requirements on a continuing basis and have the ability to break down and solve problems through analytical thinking.
2. Gathering, validating, and documenting business data requirements, like analyzing commercial or operational data.
3. Work with Data Engineers to exploratory data profile and diagnose the data abnormality.
4. Work with Data Scientists to interpret/Analyze data and research findings to different scenarios for decision making.
5. Author and update internal documentation, and initiate and deliver requirements and documentation, especially in use cases.


<Skills>： 
1. Detail-oriented, flexible with hands-on mentality, committed to delivering high-quality work product
2. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, able to connect with people at all levels & across both regional and global departments
3. Strong logical thinking and analytical skills, capable of seeing a situation from multiple perspectives.
4. Familiar with Quantitative analysis in any one field such as financial/accounting, industrial engineering/industrial management.
(Plus) Experience with common data science programming language: Python or R
(Plus) Mastery of Microsoft Office programs (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
(Plus) Experience with Microsoft Visio or Axure RP.
major: 工業工程相關 工業管理相關 會計學相關

job_name: 機器學習工程師 AI/ML Engineer(Data Science & AI Team)
cust_name: 鴻海精密工業股份有限公司
job_detail:
工作內容：
<About the job>：
We're seeking AI/ML enthusiasts with experience and skills in working and are passionate about extending AI/ML expertise. The Data Science & AI team of headquarter IT is developing the frontier and practical analytic technologies that enhance the data value. As the AI/ML engineer, you'll join the AI/Big Data Analytics program/projects of headquarter IT and assist in building the model/algorithm to empower data-driven & analytics-driven for driving business value from data insights in this world-class company (Fortune Global 500, 22nd).

<Job Type Option：> 
．Type1: AI/ML Engineer (Engineering-Oriented) 
(1) Use Machine Learning/Deeping Learning/Analytical techniques to build models for internal different scenarios and requirements. 
(2) Building the model lifecycle from data exploration to feature engineering to model evaluation and validity analysis capabilities. 
(3) Execute efficient, scalable, automated processes for model development, model validation, and model implementation 
(4) Deploy the model to production and maintain/optimize the models by MLOps.
(5) Experience in Azure Data Lake, Azure Databricks, and Azure Data Factory is preferred.
(6) Experience in AWS SageMaker is preferred.


．Type2: NLP AI Engineer
(1)    Focused on NLP Algorithm/Machine Learning & Deeping Learning for Text.
(2)    Develop the Algorithm of NLP(Natural Language Processing)/ Computational Linguistics/Text Mining/Topic Modeling
(3)    Join the project to build the end-to-end NLP systems, from understanding the requirements to selecting training datasets to model, evaluating, and delivering/deploying NLP models.


．Type3: AI/ML Engineer (Analytics-Oriented)
(1)	Use Machine Learning/Deeping Learning/Analytical techniques to build models for internal different scenarios and requirements.
(2)	Build the model lifecycle, e.g., from data exploration to feature engineering to model evaluation and validity analysis capabilities.
(3)	Execute efficient, scalable, automated processes for model development, model validation, and model implementation.
(4)	Apply quantitative methods including but not limited to above tasks to solve business problems.
(5)	Being passionate and patient about working with complex data


<Skills>
．Type1 & 3 : AI/ML Engineer(Engineering-Oriented & Analytics-Oriented) 
(1)	Familiarity with any one of Machine Learning, Statistical Modeling, Deep Learning (Nature Language/Image/Time Series) model/algorithm building of the practical application in the industry.
(2) Being familiar with Python Libraries, e.g., Numpy, Pandas, Scikit-Learn, SciPy, Matplotlib, etc. 
(3)(For Engineering-Oriented) Knowledge of Big Data with Machine Learning/Statistical modeling related technologies such as Spark MLlib or PySpark or SparkR/SparklyR. 
(4)(For Analytics-Oriented) Knowledge of Deep Learning Framework such as TensorFlow/Caffe/Pytorch/Keras.


．Type 2: NLP AI Engineer
(1)    Experience with text mining algorithms such as word segmentation, POS tagging, named entity recognition...etc. 
(2)    Experience in algorithms and libraries of NLP(Natural Language Processing), especially in machine learning techniques applied to NLP such as Text mining, Text classification, Information Extraction, Keyword Tagging, and content discovery.
(3)    Familiar with one general-purpose programming language (e.g., Python, Java, C/C++)
(4)    Experience in manipulating and integrating the unstructured, semi-structured, and structured data.
(5)    Excellent knowledge and demonstrable experience using open-source NLP packages such as NLTK, Word2Vec, Standford CoreNLP, SpaCy, Gensim.

(3)    Experience in Cloud Computing and Distributed Solutions

2.高額激勵獎金制度 :
【時薪最高320】高時薪之外，還有額外獎金：揪親友一起工作，還有介紹獎金1000元。

8.控管生產成本、人員，達成產能及出貨目標

【休假制度】
◆ 週休二日,排休制


【工作時間】
09:00-18:00（休息時間1小時），視情況加班(根據產線情況自行調配)

【福利制度】
1.享勞、健保、勞退6%

job_name: TO-轉型辦公室-專案管理師/PM
cust_name: 鴻海精密工業股份有限公司
job_detail:
一、職責歸屬：直屬總經理轉型辦公室，負責推動事業群年度轉型目標 (包 
      含財務, 能力建設, 數位化等面向)。
二、日常運營：
      1.管理績效管理引擎 (基於損益, KPI和提案改善管理系統)： 透過可 
         視化的儀表板追蹤並管理專案進度。
      2.管理轉型專案及各價值流(功能單位)的會議節奏：透過議程制定， 
         領導會議內容準備，達到目標並即時解決問題；跟進會議行動事項, 
         確保落實到位 (閉環管理)。
      3.主導高階主管會議：根據年度階段性目標及不同會議目的，設計溝 
         通主題及內容。
      4.協助財務目標審視及管理: 偕同財務辦公室監督業務單位損益差異 
         的補救措施的執行。
      5.協助準備董事長辦公室交付的報告, 會議準備, 跨事業群的溝通，及 
         集團年終檢討會的事業群成果分享。
三、中心思想：
      1.持續提升可能性：作為轉型工作倡導者，推動變革管理 (Change
         management)，試點並協助新流程和新技術的應用, 持續尋找提 
         升的可能性。
      2.關注問題的解決：以事實為依據，利用嚴謹的分析和解決問題的技
         巧，在關鍵的問題和業務決策上提出建議。
      3.跨部門協調：瞭解組織運作, 識別關鍵利害關係人, 協助解決問題和
         跨部門協調, 確保價值流(功能單位)準時獲得成果, 完成行動及目標, 
         並充分挖掘機會的潛力。

cust_name: 萬達寵物事業股份有限公司
job_detail:
▍喜愛毛寶貝、熱愛毛寶貝，沒有毛寶貝就吃不下飯、睡不著覺、人生沒有樂趣的貓奴、狗努、毛爸媽、毛家庭，您還在職涯路上尋尋覓覓，追求自我嗎?
萬達寵物事業股份有限公司，【寵物公園】是全台最知名的寵物連鎖體系集團，目前正大力發展，成為全台最強的寵物生活產業集團。2022年到2025年快速展店中，【我們正在尋找跟我們一起挑戰與改變寵物美容產業的事業夥伴!】，「『您可以在寵物公園~找到自己人生的可能』」。

▍【讓我們用『愛』共同打造更美好的『毛宇宙』】，寵物公園目前正在尋找跟我們一樣熱愛毛寶貝，共同讓產業變更好「傳遞溫暖、守護毛寶貝幸福的您」，打造屬於我們與毛寶貝共同的幸福人生。

▍我們誠心邀請你來了解下列職缺，為自己的人生尋找更多的火花：
㊜零售通路中：最熱心、最熱情、溫暖服務的「寵物美容助理」
㊜寵物產業中：最專業、最暖心、體貼守護的「寵物美容師」
㊜在服務產業中：把一家寵物美容店經營的井井有條、客人滿意度破表的「超級寵物美容長」
㊜在連鎖通路中：想讓寵物美容產業變得更好、具有遠見、數字觀念、跨區跨店經營的領導力的「美容督導」
★歡迎您加入我們，投入寵物美容產業，為毛小孩打造乾淨亮眼新氣象★

▍【工作簡介】
這是一個以服務為核心的工作與產業，會因為工作職務不同而有所差異，但滿滿的【真誠關懷、暖心服務、熱情與愛】是公司內的標準配備。
其他的工作可能包含：
1.提供親切友善的服務：毛孩美容的關心、照顧、諮詢以滿足寵物美容造型、寵物沙龍、寵物SPA、住宿服務…等工作。
2.美容室內外、環境、美容器材設備、美容耗材的維護，讓貴賓們有優質舒適、放鬆滿意的生活消費空間。
3.完成一家店寵物美容運作的日常，如：洗澡、吹整、剪腳指甲、刷牙、耳朵清潔、肛門腺清潔、運用電剪或專業剪刀完成造型修剪…等，美容師以上需具有在指定時間內採純手剪完成指定造型的能力歐。

▍【工作地點、時間】
＊上班地點：我們採區域排班，原則上在編製店上班，但會需要因為友店需要支援而跨店上班。
＊上班時間：每日上班9小時(內含有一小時休息間，原則上每四小時休息30分鐘，休息時間會需要根據美容店工作現場狀況調配歐) 。
＊排班方式：每月排班一次、依據區域內的人力需求安排調度，會有排班規則供遵循，您的意願我們一定會尊重。
＊加班管理：我們希望大家都能夠高效率工作、準時下班，但如果需要加班只要事先知會主管或是被主管拜託幫忙協助工作而致加班，都可以到系統申請加班，依法核發加班費，「多勞多得是我們不變的原則、辛苦也會獲得重視」。

▍【薪資制度】
〘獨一無二的薪資制度〙
＊我們定期進行薪資服務檢核，以零售連鎖業市場的『前25%』為薪酬標準。
＊薪資結構：『超高保障起薪+經營分紅+競賽獎金+專案任務津貼+津貼補助+專案獎金』。
＊任職滿三個月者享年終獎金，依據公司當年度營運及個人績效核發，平均1~1.5個月月薪，績效卓越者最高可以領取到4個月年終獎金。
＊起薪：全省有不同起薪，助理保障起薪28K、美容師保障薪資區間居於30K~34K、美容長保障薪資區間居於35~40K，歡迎與我們了解洽詢。
＊美容有個人點數獎金+團體獎金，績效中等者平均獎金約為3,000~5,000，績效卓越點單月獎金有機會上看6,000~10,000。
＊資深美容師或美容另可享薪資保障方案、保障月薪40K~45K。

▍【企業優勢】
★月休8~13天的休假制度(含國定假日全年休假天數平均挪調)。
★完善工作培訓制度及教育訓練規劃給您學習成長的機會。
★新人引導適應：到職有完善的新人課培訓期，有教練進行工作指導與養成，協助適應與上手，階段式人才培育養成。
★寵物員購優惠：商品享有員購優惠、本身是毛家庭一族的您不容錯過!
★晉升管道暢通：每半年固定評估、只要您準備好了，歡迎挑戰職涯晉升與加薪，持續展店~晉升加薪的機會掌握在您手上。
★勇於溝通對話的文化：給予各級人員表達心聲溝通對話的機會，我們未必凡事都能做到盡善盡美，但我們鼓勵溝通與對話，小步快跑，持續優化與進步，變得更好。
★OMO線上線下全方位整合的零售通路，打造專業的寵物管家。

▍【福利】
1.到職滿三個月即享七天特休(採特休預給制)。
2.高績效獎金及年終獎金平均1-1.5個月起(優於同業)。
3.三節獎金及生日禮金。
4.好幾百萬等級的尾牙及聚餐活動獲補助(大獎中獎率達20%、全員通通有獎、通路中最優) 。
5.每月都有教育訓練的課可以上，外面很貴的課，公司開給您，並提供教育訓練補助。
6.免費提供團體保險、為您多一分呵護與保障。
7.任職滿半年、每半年提供兩張電影票或相關休閒補助，工作之餘不忘生活平衡。
8.不定期的訂餐犒賞、飲料及下午茶獎勵。

▍【我們團隊的特色是這樣的】
＊「扁平化的溝通文化」
我們目的都是把事情做好，如果有話想說，就勇敢的說出來！
團隊有著新創的靈魂，樂於嘗試各種不同的挑戰
＊「難題的交流」
你的問題可能就是我的問題，大家集思廣益就沒有問題！
＊「友善的工作團隊」
沒有配備刀械的主管，沒有開著手機發呆同事，沒有裝忙的老闆，更沒有上演八點檔的團隊文化、我們認真執行任務，保持溝通暢通，鼓勵創新與優化。

cust_name: 富智康國際股份有限公司(鴻海集團)
job_detail:
Computer vision and sensing are the core technology for popular applications such as autonomous driving, SLAM and smart cockpit. This position is responsible for the development of the core algorithms for vision and sensing using computer vision, environment sensing, machine learning and computational photography, which are core applications for automotive products and all kinds of end devices. 

1.	Develop the core algorithm. 
2.	Optimize the algorithm / model for target commercial platforms. 
3.	Support developments of autonomous driving.
skill: 軟體工程系統開發, 軟體程式設計, Machine Learning
other:

1.Having prior knowledge of Computer Science and Information Engineering fields. 
2.Familiarity with at least one of the programming languages: C, C++, Java, Python. 
3.Familiarity with at least one core technology: computer vision, machine learning, 3D vision, computer graphics, computational photography, sensing, and having research ability or project experience. 
Preferred Qualifications: 
1.Familiarity with deep learning theory and common development frameworks, e.g., Tensorflow, PyTorch, Caffe. 
2.Having development experiences with professional toolkits, e.g., OpenCV, OpenCL, OpenGL. 
3.Familiarity with development environments, e.g., Windows, Linux, Android, Android Automotive, QNX. 
4.Familiarity with AR / VR / MR core technologies and applications.

1. 企業內部數位化/智能化轉型顧問
2. 挖掘內部 數位化/智能化 需求，對現有業務流程進行端對端的梳理與診斷，提供數位化/智能化的優化建議，協助用戶對接交付團隊實現需求
3. 調研外部 數位化/智能化 案例，針對新技術應用進行評估，規劃符合企業內部使用的解決方案，導入到企業內部
4. 按照公司業務目標，進行短中期 數位化/智能化 系統整體策略規劃，協助團隊按照公司整體方向前進
5. 負責新需求在正式立項前的推進管理及效益評估
major: 資訊工程相關 資訊管理相關
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
1. 具備工程或是製造相關專業大學及以上學歷
2. 針對客戶問題具有快速理解並尋找解決方案之能力，且具有優秀的文案撰寫及口述表達之能力
3. 至少需具備下列兩項之專業
 A. ERP、MES、APS、PLM 等企業級應用軟體規劃導入經驗
 B. 軟體(客製專案或商用產品)規劃、設計、開發、及管理經驗
 C. IoT、大數據、AI應用、可視化、報表開發等相關之應用經驗
4. 具備專案管理能力和相關實務經驗，跨部門與設計、強烈的進取心、結果導向的協同推動力
5. 具備較好的談判能力，在複雜的交付專案中可以有效的平衡成本和品質
6. 具備產業研析能力，對創新數位科技具靈敏度(例如IoT、AI、5G/6G等)，並能掌握關鍵業者發展動向
7. 具備自我學習研究能力, 對新技術具敏感度，有能力與方法評估采用幷導入新技術，及制定使用技術規範

job_name: Graph DB Engineer/Data Engineer(Graph AI in Data Science & AI Team)
cust_name: 鴻海精密工業股份有限公司
job_detail:
<About the job>
As the Graph DB Engineer, you'll join the advanced "Graph AI Projects" as well as the development of intelligent applications via related AI and Big Data Analytics Technology for digital transformation. Graph technology is a rapidly growing area, so you will have plenty of opportunities to develop emerging applications based on different use cases and expand your tech skillset in this world-class company (Fortune Global 500, 22nd).

<Job Description>
Graph Database Engineer/ Developer(or Graph Database Expert)：
(1) Graph Data Structures 
．Implement the Graph DB related project to deploy the Graph DB (e.g. Neo4j, ArangoDB, Azure COSMOS, TigerGraph).
．Execute the data pipeline processing, design the data architecture of Graph DB, including graph data modeling, graph schema development, graph data design for transactional (OLTP), and analytical (OLAP) workloads
(2) Graph DB Application Development：
．Co-work with Data Scientists and assist in developing analytical applications leveraging graph databases and graph-based analytics.


<Skills>
(1)Strong experience in Graph Databases like Neo4j, ArangoDB, Azure COSMOS, etc.
(2)Familiar with Graph Query Languages, Open Graph APIs, SPARQL (or Gremlin or DQL or GSQL or CQL) 
(3)Understanding of NoSQL databases, Graph OLTP, and OLAP processes.
(4)Hands-on expertise to model data in the form of graph nodes and vertices.
(5)Familiar with Programming and scripting languages like Python/Nodejs/Java.
major: 資訊管理相關 電機電子工程相關 數學及電算機科學學科類
other:
**Nice to have:(not required)
(1)5 years of relevant experience in the general database(Relational DB/NoSQL) design with emphasis on graph storage models
(2)Familiar with graph visualization and analysis tools
(3)Experiences in implementing full-stack solutions leveraging graph databases, typically Neo4j, ArangoDB, Azure COSMOS.

Solutions range from Fiber Gateways, Docsis (cable) Gateways to Wi-Fi Mesh Extenders and 4G/5G solutions. As a Product Manager - Architect, you define wining technical solutions (hardware block diagrams, new mechanical concepts,....) in-line with the defined cost targets.

1. Build up a deep understanding of market and technology trends. Use that know-how in combination with vision/creativity to create winning solutions.
2. Support the bid phase: creation of wining solutions (technical and cost)
3. Evangelize our solutions to customers and partners. As a key member of the customer facing team, target customer satisfaction and award of new business.
根據終端用戶的需求和市場技術趨勢，負責建構符合的的解決方案。解決方案包括從GPON、 Cable Docsis Gateway、Wi-Fi Mesh Router和 4G / 5G終端解決方案 。作爲一個硬件架構產品經理，你需定義制勝的技術解決方案（硬件架構，新機構概念，……）並且符合規定的成本目標。
1.建立對市場和技術趨勢的深刻理解。並將這些專業知識與願景/創造力相結合，創造出成功的解決方案。
2.支持投標階段：創造雙贏的解決方案（技術和成本）
3.向客戶和合作夥伴宣傳我們的解決方案。作爲面向客戶團隊的重要成員，以客戶滿意度和贏取開案爲目標。

- Successful (hardware) engineering track record with 'an eye for cost'  is a must
- Experience with Fiber, Wi-Fi, Docsis, 4G/5G,… technologies is a strong plus
- Excellent communication and presentation skills (English)
- Positive attitude, resilience, out-of-box thinking, ability to work under pressure and ability to guide a multidisciplinary team are strong plusses

cust_name: 鴻海精密工業股份有限公司
job_detail:
We are seeking an experienced system debug engineer with strong background in the cloud/datacenter domain. In this position, you will play a key role in realizing vision to work closely with Foxconn’s biggest customers: CSPs to enable and scale out Foxconn latest server platforms and technologies. This position will have a chance to touch cutting-edge silicon, server hardware technologies and emerging firmware and OS solutions, and apply them to the CSPs. 
Responsibilities include: 
•	Mastering the latest Intel/AMD/Ampere hardware and platform features. Tracking the enabling status of those features in silicon, low-level firmware/software, Operating System and latest Linux Upstream Kernel.
•	Debug customer data-center issues related to platform enabling and customization. Deep dive and root cause silicon enabling and system integration issues to sub system or source code level.
•	Closely collaborate with silicon enabling, firmware development, and various component teams from third-party vendors (e.g., memory, storage, network, power and performance, thermal/mechanical, I/O, etc.) to troubleshoot and debug cross-discipline and complex integration issues on server platforms. Drive debug taskforce cross functions to ensure timely issue resolution.
•	Contribute to the definition of new platforms with software architecture and development teams, support platform bring-up activities, review designs and code changes
•	Contribute to validation team on improving test plan/method to validate features and verify fixes
•	Put new technology into practice in the fastest manner, explore all possible alternatives for better solution, and pursue constant improvement on debug methodology and tool
•	Define and drive the system debug process implementation and ingredient owner engagement and alignment
Qualifications:
The candidate should possess a Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science or relevant technology (advanced degree is preferred) with 5+ years of applicable industrial experience in the following: 
•	Solid understanding of x86/IA with design experience or working knowledge on CPU, DIMM, Chipset and Platform
•	Strong low-level debugging skills that enable the root causing of issues across hardware, firmware and OS levels
•	Experience with ASSET SCANWORKS, Intel ITP and Cscript development. Experience with PythonSV or programming with Python. In-depth knowledge of CPU flows and experience on silicon level debug and ASD (e.g. CrashDump Analysis) are preferred
•	Solid understanding and hands-on development/validation experience of popular server/PC technologies including PCI/PCI-E, USB, SAS/SATA, i2C/SMBUS, IPMI, BIOS/EFI and DIMM, Storage, Networking, Virtualization, Manageability, Security, RAS, etc.
•	Understanding of Operating System, Driver, BIOS and firmware fundamentals. Programming skills (e.g. C/C++) that enable the source code level debug and issue fix is highly preferred.
•	Experience at model-based problem solving that enable the effective investigation and narrow-down of complex issues;
•	Demonstrated capability to work within a team environment facing fast-changing requirements and complicated stakeholders.
major: 電機電子工程相關 資訊管理相關 資訊工程相關
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
other:
Depending on candidate's domain background, following additional skills are needed:
•	For BIOS domain candidate, good x86 server BIOS development background and debug experience with Intel XDP is a must. Experience of ACPI, PCIe, RAS is a plus; 
•	For OS domain candidate, experience on Linux kernel debug is a must; Experience of debugging/fixing Linux system power and performance issues is a plus; Experience of Linux kernel upstream development is a plus
•	For Hardware and I/O domain candidate, good knowledge and 3+ years enabling experience of hardware I/O or devices is a must, including but not limited to SATA, USB, SAS, and/or Networking (IB, 25Gb/100Gb Ethernet etc) ; server baseboard design experience is a plus
•	For Server Management domain candidate, good understanding and development experience of IPMI, redfish, NCSI, APML, Node Manager are expected

job_name: 電商天藍小舖徵求網路行銷企劃人員
cust_name: 天藍小舖
job_detail:
天藍小舖知名電商公司.創立於2003年主營流行女包.流行女裝.
於2017年獲得迪士尼授權.開始從事迪士尼商品設計與開發.
現徵求對流行產業有高度興趣.或對迪士尼商品有相當程度的喜愛的妳加入我們的團隊!!

工作內容:
1.對數位行銷有強烈熱忱、好奇心、靈敏洞察力，熟悉數位產業中各媒體與工具
2.擁有行銷專案管理能力，含企劃撰寫、策略規劃、創意發想、彙整提案、媒體購買、預算控管
3.熟悉社群媒體，具備1年以上社群經驗(FB、IG、LINE@、wechat 等兩種平台以上操作經驗).內容行銷，與會員、粉絲、網友溝通互動。
4.能進行廣告數據分析，專案執行結案報告撰寫，提出專業反饋與建議
5. 異業合作：具備異業合作開發能力，特別是網路媒體、KOL/網紅合作。
6. 影音企劃：懂得怎麼透過影音說一個好故事（不用會剪輯，但是懂剪輯概念是加分的）。
7. 廣告投放：數位廣告投放，控管預算與成果分析，優化廣告投放效益。
8. 需具備責任感，熱愛工作，樂意溝通協調，遵守公司規定，有時效性任務時需配合加班
9. 有源源不絕的創意點子，喜歡各種新挑戰並樂於嘗試各種可能性。 

上班時間:周一~周五 9:00-18:00 須能配合加班會依法給予加班費
周休二日見紅就休、享勞健保、勞退、生日禮金、生日假、伙食津貼、員購、員工聚餐、員工旅遊、年資滿一年享年終獎金、年假

cust_name: 台灣康寧顯示玻璃股份有限公司
job_detail:
Purpose of the Position:
• Manages the PEx Project Portfolio for a plant or site location assuring the effective use of the different improvement methodologies (DMAIC, Lean, PQA, DESGN, etc.) towards the achievement of plant/site strategic goals.  
• Assist and coach belts and managers in the project nomination, selection, implementation and documentation processes and are actively engaged in advising plant management and leaders on the use of Quality tools, methods and processes.
• Develop TPOCS Plant PEx and Lean culture, and Build up manufacturing activities linked with P&L.

Day to Day Responsibilities:
• Ensures the successful execution of the PEx Portfolio and its alignment with the Division and Corporate strategic goals.
• Consistently improves the QCDMS+I metrics in alignment with the business strategy for the Division/Function.
• Promotes the correct use of the DMAIC/DESGN/PQA/Lean tools. 
• Oversees belt utilization, assisting management in achieving maximum belt capacity.
• Executes a training strategy to achieve the goals of the plant or site location.
• Supports Corporate Quality and the Division Champion with corporate initiatives (e.g. training development, process changes, global translations of PEx materials).
• Leads the Belts in the site location, through a Community of Practice, for enhanced sharing of project successes, tool methodologies or new training programs. 
• Works closely with operations and Engineering teams to drive process consistency and deliver great products and services to our customers.
• Promoting the participation of all departments in the identification of cost reduction or improvement opportunities.
• Setup Manufacturing Standard cycle time and Identify opportunities to improve Availability, Performance, and Yield.
• Develop TPOCS Plant PEx and Lean culture, and Build up manufacturing activities linked with P&L.
major: 工業工程相關
language: 英文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通
other:
Required Skills:
• Demonstrated track record of Engineering / IE accomplishment such as delivery of sustainable incremental improvement, step change in capability / performance, etc.
• Demonstrated delivery of results through project with Cost Reduction, Methodologies (DMAIC, Lean, PQA, DESGN, etc.) and organizational leadership.
• Demonstrated track record (Performance Results and People Development).
• Experience in operations and/or engineering with progressive responsibilities.
• Demonstrate ability in diagnosing and identifying lean improvement opportunities in operation with 3+ years experiences.

Desired Skills:
• Experience across multiple organizations/plants.
• Knowledge of manufacturing accounting and control.
• Knowledge of manufacturing excellence tools (AME, KT, Lean).
• Experience with cross-functional collaboration.
• Lean/IE audit experience in manufacturing systems.
• Certified Green Belt.
• Data analytical software (SPSS, Minitab, SPC XL).

cust_name: 台灣康寧顯示玻璃股份有限公司
job_detail:
Scope of Position:
• Apply knowledge of engineering principles and practices to effectively implement OCS Quality Management system goals and initiatives.
• Develop, implement, and maintain systems and procedures required to successfully meet division and corporate goals and objectives. 
• Ensure customer requirements are consistently met by maintaining OCS quality systems and platforms.  
• Effectively take action when non-conformances are found.
• Ensure that documented practices meet the true interpretation of the OCS Quality Management System and TL 9000 requirements.

Day to Day Responsibilities:
• Support OCS Quality Systems by creating, maintaining, and executing the global Quality Systems strategy.
• Conduct activities that directly support the maintenance of plant QMS certifications.
• Support execution of Quarterly Division Quality Management System Reviews. 
• Facilitate efforts in understanding process capability and product quality architecture.
• Facilitate root cause analysis on products and processes not meeting specified standards and requirements.
• Work with cross-functional teams to identify and implement improvement opportunities and corrective/preventative actions. 
• Analyze critical Quality performance data to identify opportunities for improvement.
• Maintain and execute Division internal audit program.
• Perform audits of OCS plants and processes to determine compliance to OCS Quality Management System and TL 9000 requirements
• Collaborate with engineering and manufacturing functions to ensure quality standards are in place.
• Participate in the governance of Quality Management System processes.
• Provide training to support implementation and execution of Division Quality platforms and processes.
• Lead Quality roadmap improvement projects.
• Participate in Performance Excellence (Six-Sigma) projects, assuring the effective use of different improvement methodologies (DMAIC, Lean, DESGN, PQA, etc.)

Required Skills:
• Statistical competency; understands variability, sampling methods
• Structured problem-solving skills to drive to root cause (e.g., KT)
• Solid communication skills (written, verbal, presentation)
• Solid project management skills
• Familiarity with Quality Systems, audits, TL 9000 and ISO Certifications 
• Self-starter; ability to drive projects to closure
• Lean and Six Sigma certifications preferred

• Lead direct quality engineering resources in the development and improvement of processes and equipment. 
• Achieve low cost manufacturing, superior quality/service and improved capability/capacity. 
• Develops, modifies, applies and maintains quality evaluation and control systems and protocols for processing materials into partially finished or finished materials product. Collaborates with engineering and manufacturing functions to ensure quality standards are in place. 
• Devises and implements methods and procedures for inspecting, testing and evaluating the precision and accuracy of products and production equipment. 
• Designs and analyzes inspection and testing processes, mechanisms and equipment; conducts quality assurance tests; and performs statistical analysis to assess the cost of and determine the responsibility for, products or materials that do not meet required standards and specifications. 
• Audits quality systems for deficiency identification and correction. 
• Ensures that corrective measures meet acceptable reliability standards and that documentation is compliant with requirements. 
• In this role, would assist manager in project selection and implementation; and advise division/plant management and leaders on the use of Quality tools, methods and processes. 
• Receives assignments in the form of objectives with goals and process to meet goals outlined.

job_name: 智能居家區主任(全省總店)
cust_name: 鎖庫智能有限公司
job_detail:
.負責介紹及銷售門市商品。

 ｛對自己長相有自信 愛打扮,乾淨,親切,熱心｝

1大部分得時間最主要就是門市銷售一天頂多大約1~2客人(半小時~一小時)
2.提供顧客之接待與需求服務
3.須有良好的溝通技巧及自我情緒管理。
4.維持店櫃週遭之整潔。
5.網路訊息回覆。（公司另有人員幫忙看誰比較空閑時間互相幫忙）
6.新行業有未來性發展 （公司有升遷制度適合有責任感的妳）以上工作相對簡單基本上工作沒什麼壓力 主要重點就是客人進門時的型號介紹而已 認識商品相對的也不需要花很久的時間 需要有『親和力以及耐心』『公司提供專業教育訓練』『和樂的工作環境 歡迎有熱誠的你』
7 晉升辦法 ：有辦法獨立處理 廠商，客戶需求，頭腦清晰 工作能力強 『可以逐年提升薪資』 
8門市業績 採用共同業績 ，網路目前也屬於共同業績 才不會搶客人 或是新人沒業績的情況  我們會在網路線上以訊息方式，引導客人來店內消費，當然也算業績！！
獎金福利說明：
1. 三節獎金或禮品：2月、5月、9月
2. 除了基本底薪之外，門市銷售獎金有旺季淡季。淡季再爛也有每個月10000（平均10000~60000) 我們網路上面販售的業績採用共同業績不用擔心被老鳥欺負沒有業績 我們需要的是一齊成長的員工 ，工作內容不難學、有企圖心、 自我要求高、 上進心、 有目標佳（薪水的多寡取決於你自己多認真  有能力做網路銷售的人 可以另外談）
3. 每年員工旅遊 （這個部分都會選比較高檔的地方）
4. 享勞健保.勞退
5. 不定期聚餐（只吃貴的）

本公司開立以來，還有沒有人想離職 不管是內勤小姐 外勤師父 都如此 歡迎一起共創美好未來～～
目前徵求 電話客服 銷售 網路小編 寫文章 等等 如果有相關能力可額外洽談

cust_name: 御軒食品有限公司
job_detail:
物管／資材
1. 與負責物流業務的客戶建立良好的商業關係。
2. 負責原料、物料、庫存和成品的供給和配送。
3. 預估市場供需趨勢，掌控安全庫存量，以避免供貨短缺對公司造成的負面影響。
4. 規劃並導入專案管理工具或流程。
5. 撰寫專案的計劃、過程和結果，並提出報告。
6. 編輯與分析產品發展所需的技術性資料。

其他機械操作員
1. 觀察機械的運作情形，偵測設備不足處或機械故障處，必要時須進行調整。
2. 閱讀藍圖或作業流程，用以決定產品規格和整修指導步驟，並規畫操作的順序。
3. 設立和操作車床、切割器、裁剪器、穿孔器、銑床、研磨器、壓榨機、鑽柄和輔助機械等機械設備，以製造出金屬和塑膠的機械零件。
4. 用人力或起重機擺放、調整與固定原料、零件或自動式機械，用以避免機械在操作過程中停止。
5. 檢查機械零件不足處，以確定機械操作的準確性。
6. 替換磨損的機械零件，如：切割器、手動工具等。
7. 進行細部的電子和機械維修、調整工作，如：潤滑及清潔機械和零件、在機械中添加冷卻劑等事宜。

倉管
1. 蒐集、計算貨物清單，並用紙筆或電腦記錄資料。
2. 以有條理且易取得的方式儲存擺放倉庫中的貨品項目。
3. 複查庫存的貨物數量與紀錄是否相符，查出不一致之處並更正錯誤。
4. 利用辨識標籤、印花、標籤工具或其他標籤設備，在庫存貨物上做記號。
5. 定期清潔庫存、工具、設備或貯藏室，以確保符合安全規章。
6. 檢查庫存貨物中損壞或缺少的地方，並將損壞提報給相關負責人。
7. 支援、指導其他貯藏室、倉庫的工作人員。
6. 檢查庫存貨物中損壞或缺少的地方，並將損壞提報給相關負責人。
7. 支援、指導其他貯藏室、倉庫的工作人員。

job_name: 手機配件門市銷售夥伴(土城店)
cust_name: 某3C手機配件館
job_detail:
【唯酷3C配件】
【熱誠親切的服務態度，３Ｃ配件專業的領導者 】
1. 於門市裡提供客人最親切的商品介紹及銷售服務。
2. 新手需熟練手機平板貼膜能力。
3. 負責店務經營領導及推動業績目標達成 。
4. 個性活潑、有親切笑容，學習與客戶保持良好的應對、歡樂的氣氛與親切的溝通。
5. 每日商品上架整理，店內外清潔整頓，商品搭配與拍攝，商品盤點庫存。

●工作態度積極、具有責任心、抗壓性高、肯學習。
●不隨意亂請假遲到，重視出席率。
●追求長期穩定的工作，並願與我們ㄧ同進步、成長者，歡迎您的加入。
●對於銷售商品到顧客手上，而您非常享受顧客滿意的成就感，我們歡迎您的加入。

【對手機通訊商品感興趣者佳】
【對銷售３Ｃ通訊配件感興趣者佳】

【基本工資＋獎金制度】

※ 必須喜歡打扮；喜歡與人互動交流；活潑有抗壓性！
※ 充滿學習的心；熱愛３Ｃ產品的穿著；善於搭配流行！
--
※ 本店擁有完善的薪資制度與獎金制度
